mapper.select: SELECT p.`pro_id`,p.`pro_question`,p.proAdminContext,u.`account`,p.`pro_name`,p.`pro_phone` FROM `problems` AS p,`user` AS u WHERE p.`user_Id`=u.`userid` and pro_if=0
mapper.update: UPDATE problems SET proAdminContext=#{proAdminContext} where pro_id=#{pro_id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.`pro_id`,p.`pro_question`,p.proAdminContext,u.`account`,p.`pro_name`,p.`pro_phone` FROM `problems` AS p,`user` AS u WHERE p.`user_Id`=u.`userid` AND p.`pro_question` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pro_question},'%') and pro_if=0
mapper.update: UPDATE problems SET pro_if=1 WHERE pro_id = #{pro_id}
